Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: I had this urge to start smoking cigars all id the sudden. I had no idea about that so after a fast google search i ve found Cigaragua to be a well rated store. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: We went there yesterday, we were a group of 6 with no much knowledge concerning cigars and this experience was really nice. We were really well advised and the people were so nice. It is really nice place to smoke and discover cigars with friends. Definitely nice, something we will remember. Thank you much ! :-)

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Really superb place, largest walk-in humidor in EU (80m2!!) and even bigger lounge. I picked few singles and the guy working there was very helpful, even gifted me a lighter :o). It has all Nicaraguan cigars you can think of and more...

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: My favorite cigar lounge in Amsterdam, great place to (net-) work, make new friends and enjoy a smoke at the same time. Good wifi and coffee + drinks available. Though no Havanas sold at the shop, they have an amazing selection of ‚Ä¶

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Amazing cigar shop and lounge. Very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful staff. A must see for all the cigar lovers visiting Amsterdam!

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Very friendly, personalized greeting by the manager and an amazing selection of Nicaraguan cigars. No Cubans here, but don't let that stop you. The Tatuaje Cojonu 2012 pressed cigars can complete with anything the Island has to offer. Nice ‚Ä¶

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text:
Probably the best humidor I have ever been !

All Nicaragua is here, nicely presented, well stored, the staff is very ‚Ä¶

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Very large selection of Nicaragua plus a comfortable smoking lounge with different drinks available. Knowledgeable staff to help selecting (if that is needed).

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: This place deserves nothing short of a full five stars. The guy working there was very friendly and helpful. No rush. Talk, get you the right type of cigar for you and enjoy. The smoking room downstairs is so chilled. Everything you need to ‚Ä¶

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Absolutely amazing selection of cigars. Very friendly and professional service. The lounge is a great place to sit and enjoy a high quality cigar and, drink of choice.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Paradise of cigars!!! The personnel was the best!! Very helpful, very friendly with great sense of humour!!! We loved these guys!!! Also you can rest your body among other smokers and enjoy a great cigar!!!

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: If you would like to extend your experience or develop your taste (coming from the Cuban side ;-) towards Nicaragua, this is the place: amazing selection, fantastic skilled sales persons with passion and joy, and on top of it: an cigar lounge to enjoy right on the spot, accompanied by a drink... Simply wonderful!

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text:
Outstanding customer service and support.
Items delivered quickly well packed and in perfect conditions.
People working there are very Supportive.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: PARADISE ! For a cigars lover, it's a paradise. The shop is really big and you have a lot a choices at differents prices, the staff is really friendly and helpful. I didnt had the time to smoke here but the next time in Amsterdam i will !

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: The rating is for their online shop, which used to have a good selection, but now it only offers a very limited selection of box only purchases. What a pity

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Friendly staff, good cigars and relax atmosphere in the smoking room. Definitely recommend this place! Especially good before visiting a concert at the concertgebouw, since it's open till 2100 every evening.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Lovely place .. knowledgeable people .. you can enjoy your time and your cigar there

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: This is the place to be in Netherlands.. Service is excellent, cigars are out of this world. One of the best Shops I' ve ever stepped foot in. Well Done.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: I would give it more stars if I could. The selection of cigars is huge and is kept in a  room size humidor. The owner is extremely  knowledgeable and friendly, and if you are a beginner, he will help you find your favourite cigar, explain ‚Ä¶

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: The largest collection of Nicaraguan cigars I've seen win a massive selection from their walk-in humidor. The lounge is very well kept, cozy, and has nice Xikar style lighters with every ash tray. Soft lounge music and gentle lighting ‚Ä¶

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: I‚Äôm an American, currently sitting in the lounge of Cigaragua smoking one of the finest Nicaraguan cigars I‚Äôve ever had the pleasure to smoke. Wonderful staff, friendly, helpful. I‚Äôm no expert concerning cigars but they were happy to get me ‚Ä¶

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Amazing store for cigar lovers. Very wide choice of cigars and equipment. The best thing is they have very quiet bar downstairs, with light music where you can drink coffee for free while smoking cigar you just bought of them. I recommend the place to all cigar lovers. Definitely worth seeing and smoking one there.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: I was there on Monday , 17th Feb. 2020. My third visit to the store. It isn't the best store in Amsterdam, Its the best in the Netherlands ! The selection of cigars is huge and the service and friendliness of the staff unrivalled.  It has a ‚Ä¶

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Great customer service. Huge selection. Great smoking room. Open later than other places. Convenient location to public transport.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Could this be the best cigar shop in Amsterdam? In Europe? In the world? A vast selection of Nicaraguan sticks in all fa√ßons and for every wallet. It's like paradise on earth if you like Nicaraguan cigars, and if you haven't tried smoking ‚Ä¶

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Great cigars selection and good smoking room!!!

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: A very good selection cigars, very helpful staff and they take their time to advise you when needed. Nice and friendly atmosphere.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: An incredible cigar emporium based near the museum quarter in Amsterdam. Really helpful and knowledgeable owner and if you've never tried a Nicaraguan cigar it's well worth a visit. One of the largest walk-in humidors and a smoking lounge downstairs to sample (enjoy) your purchase.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Hands down the best place in amsterdam to buy (from an amazing selection) and enjoy a cigar on the spot. Cordial and friendly stuff, they make you feel like you are the most welcomed guest of the day.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text:
Heaven does indeed exist and its its called Cigaragua.

The level of service and knowledge provided by the workers is a virtue ive not ‚Ä¶

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Cigaragua Cigars totally deserves a 5/5, tge staff was more than wholesome, took the time to find us the perfect product even when aware we were not going to spend much. The shop is clean, very well equipped and the collection of cigars is just amazing.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Nice bright - and well ventilated - smoking lounge, wide selection of Nicaraguan cigars. Next to this good selection of wines and local beers. Fine place to enjoy your cigar in peace and quiet.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Great Nicaragua cigars selection, friendly staff and big and conformable lounge. Perfect place to have a smoke in a relax atmosphere with a glass of whiskey.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: So proud that our Oliva Cigars received a nice spot in this amazing humidor and cigar lounge!  Widest selection of Nicaraguan cigars of the world; really worth a visit!

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Excellent selection of Nicaraguan cigars, nice lounge.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Amazing customer service for choosing the right cigar for you

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Well where to start Romel what a wonderful lad so knowledgeable on cigars ! Very large selection and incredibly interesting to have a look ! But back to Romel cant believe how nice and friendly he was sat and smoked with us chatting away ! Would recommend to anyone

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: I can't visit Amsterdam with a visit here. The staff is knowledgeable and offers good recommendations, and the lounge below is a nice place to have a drink while you enjoy your purchase as you watch football. Just remember to hang your jacket on the peg *outside* the lounge.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text:
A great selection of Nicaraguan cigars and truly excellent service.
The staff was knowledgeable. I also got help fixing a troublesome lighter.
Well worth a visit.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Absolute must, Onno works there Tuesday to Thursday and Sunday, he is an expert, smoke cigars inside should you be invited to the separate smoking club downstairs, experience flavor development like you never have before, extremely reasonable prices for a top notch product. Cigar smoking course included free of charge.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Perfect online ordering experience. Next day delivery very carefully packed with air-bags,a free lighter and even a boveda pack!! I will definately order from Cigaragua again.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: A feel like home atmosphere in a comfortable and well ventilated cigar lounge. The selection of Nicaraguan cigars tops 800 varieties......pure joy.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text:

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Wow, what a selection... great cigars, good advice, very big smoking lounge which is very wel equipped for working as well as relaxing. If you love cigars and haven't visited this place...........

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Visited 4 or 5 times. Very big collection of Nigaraguan cigars. You have to try some to decide which you like. My self would advise: Oliva, Padron, Drew Estate, San Cristobal. Lesser tastes for me: Tatuajo and Asylum Schizo.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: The friendliest cigar shop in Amsterdam. Huge selection of Nicaraguans in a great walk-in humidor. Also possible to smoke in the lounge.

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Cigaragua is the places to visit if you enjoy, or are curious about, cigars. Wonderful lounge, great selections and a bunch of social smokers. I'll be BACK!!

Name: Cigaragua
Review Text: Amazing selection of cigars. Super helpful and friendly staff - found exactly the gift I was looking for.
